1.0.1.name: wordpress/ozh-better-plugin-page
1.0.1.description:
Better Plugin Page brings a few valueable enhancements to the Plugin Management page: tiny icons, less clutter, quick action links. Handy for those who have 70+ plugins on their blog.

Check the demo here and visit the official page of Better Plugin Page

Tip: To keep track of this plugin's evolution and features, you are advised to subscribe to the author's feed
